amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the SEC to study whether or not it has the authority to enforce anti-evasion provisions associated with the shareholder threshold and to report the results to Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 112-409 to authorize the Securities and Exchange Commission to study whether or not it has the authority to enforce anti-evasion provisions associated with the shareholder threshold.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
